task.title: Installing XALAN XSLT Processor
task.shortdesc: You can alternatively use the XALAN SXLT Processor to import stylesheets and queries into an XML schema, validate XML data against a schema, and select the elements and attributes in your XML documents according to their schema-defined type.

step.cmd: From SAXON: The Xalan Processor page, scroll to find the heading xalan-j_2_6_0-bin.zip. Click to downlad.
Save and unzip the xalan-j_2_6_0-bin.zip file to C:\ directory as xalan.
Set the CLASSPATH environment variable for following .jar files: xalan.jar file and the xercesImpl.jar file
